SELECT wms_refund.* FROM wms_refund LEFT JOIN wms_procurement on wms_procurement.id = wms_refund.product_procurement_id LEFT JOIN wms_suppliers on wms_procurement.supplier_id = wms_suppliers.id where 1=1
AND (wms_suppliers.supplier_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR wms_refund.product_refund_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR wms_procurement.procurement_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
AND wms_refund.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundCode},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_procurement_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productProcurementId},'%')
AND wms_refund.storage_in_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.storageOutId},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_warehouse_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundWarehouseId},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_quantities LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundQuantities},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundTime},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_time >= date(#{startTime}) AND wms_refund.product_refund_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND wms_refund.product_refund_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundStatus},'%')
AND wms_refund.product_refund_note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productRefundNote},'%')
AND wms_refund.originator_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.originatorId},'%')
AND wms_refund.transaction_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionBy},'%')
AND wms_refund.transaction_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionTime},'%')
AND wms_refund.field1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field1},'%')
AND wms_refund.field2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field2},'%')
order by wms_refund.product_refund_time DESC

SELECT wms_storage_out_item.*,t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit FROM wms_storage_out_item left join t_sku_product on t_sku_product.id = wms_storage_out_item.sku_id WHERE 1=1 and (wms_storage_out_item.id = #{outItemId} and wms_storage_out_item.type = 'Others')

SELECT wms_storage_out.*,wms_warehouse.warehouse_name as warehouseName FROM wms_storage_out left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_storage_out.warehouse_id WHERE 1=1 and wms_storage_out.id = #{outId}

SELECT SUM(wms_storage_out_item.transaction_quantities) AS refundCount FROM wms_storage_out_item LEFT JOIN wms_storage_out on (wms_storage_out.id = wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id and wms_storage_out_item.type='Others') LEFT JOIN wms_refund on (wms_storage_out.id = wms_refund.storage_out_id AND wms_storage_out.transaction_type = 'Refund') LEFT JOIN wms_procurement on wms_refund.product_procurement_id = wms_procurement.id WHERE wms_storage_out_item.sku_id=#{skuId} AND wms_procurement.id=#{procurementId}
